text:
For purposes of this Article, the following terms shall have the meanings given below:
     (a)     The term "Board" shall mean the Board of Supervisors of the City.
     (b)     The term "Board of Directors" shall mean the Board of Directors of the SFMTA.
     (c)     The term "Charter" shall mean the Charter of the City.
     (d)     The term "City" shall mean the City and County of San Francisco.
     (e)     The term "Director of Transportation" shall mean the Director of Transportation of the SFMTA, or his/her designee, or any successor to that Office.
     (f)     The term "SFMTA" shall mean the San Francisco Municipal Transportation Agency of the City.
(Added by Ord. 57-12, File No. 111354, App. 4/19/2012, Eff. 5/19/2012)
